desc: 全状態異常を無効＆防御力・最大ＨＰを６０％アップ＆スパークダメージを半分に軽減＆追加ダメージを半分に軽減＆確率で１回まで戦闘不能を耐える

dictionary.lore: A crystal imbued with divine energies by a monk on a pilgrimage in another world. The monk is said to have visited extreme environments inaccessible to normal individuals in this quest in order to gather divine energy. Though accounts linger across the land even now, the earliest and latest written accounts span over one thousand years. Some scholars contend that the crystal's power may have extended the monk's life for such a duration.

name: 永奉の天幻晶
